information_for_contributors: This file has been converted from https://github.com/RedCMD/YAML-Syntax-Highlighter/blob/master/syntaxes/yaml.tmLanguage.json
If you want to provide a fix or improvement, please create a pull request against the original repository.
Once accepted there, we are happy to receive an update request.
name: YAML Ain't Markup Language

parity.comment: Yes... That is right. Due to the changes with \x2028, \x2029, \x85 and 'tags'. This is all the code I was able to reuse between all versions 1.3, 1.2, 1.1 and 1.0
